title: Hadassa: or The history of Queene Ester with meditations thereupon, diuine and morall. By Fra. Quarles.
author: Quarles, Francis, 1592-1644.
publisher: Imprinted [by Felix Kingston] for Richard Moore, and are to be sold at his shop in Saint Dunstans Church-yard, in Fleetstreet,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
